alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 8:56AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Snow showers will impact portions of northern New York and northern Vermont through 1145 AM EDT... HAZARD...Periods of visibility less than a half mile. Rapid snow accumulations up to an inch possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility and slick road conditions will pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, Barre, Montpelier, Lyndon, Plattsburgh, Middlebury, South Burlington, Plattsburgh International Airport, Burlington, Tupper Lake, Island Pond, White River Junction, Burlington International Airport, Saranac Lake, St. Johnsbury, Adirondack Regional Airport, Newport City, Vergennes, Lake Placid and Peru. This includes the following highways... Interstate 87 between mile markers 82 and 175. Interstate 89 between mile markers 1 and 129. Interstate 91 between mile markers 70 and 79, between mile markers 84 and 92, and between mile markers 94 and 177. Interstate 93 between mile markers 1 and 11.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex
